{"step_by_step_thinking": "ABC (Always, Better, Control) and VED (Vital, Essential, Desirable) analysis are inventory management techniques. They are used to categorize items into different classes based on their consumption value or criticality. In the context of a Primary Health Center (PHC), these techniques would be used to manage the inventory of drugs, ensuring that vital and high-consumption drugs are always available.", "answer_choice": "A"}
